name: a Helping Hand
description: A Helping Hand is a mini-game that is easy to play but has thought-provoking plots. The player’s character is designed to be an elite in exquisite suits at the upper level who kindly helps those who try to climb up from the lower level overcome challenges ranging from a frozen ladder to a fire-breathing evil dragon, so that the latter can reach the upper level easily. However, the ungrateful commoner will kill his savior, which triggers a new scene where the character at the lower level is dressed neatly in suits who will be helped by another one at the upper level in a delicate tuxedo.
